title: Once-in-a-Lifetime Uluru Luxury Outback Retreat with All-Inclusive Dining & Drinks
description: Marvel at the majestic beauty of Uluru with a once-in-a-lifetime stay at the spectacular Longitude 131°, brought to you by the ultra-luxe Baillie Lodges, member of the Luxury Lodges of Australia collection. Nestled among the rich red dunes of Uluru-Kata Tjuta, Longitude 131° is a bucket-list destination, a luxurious safari-style retreat promising guests an unforgettable escape amid the impressive scenery of the Northern Territory's Red Centre.
